column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been to Smoque BBQ on several occasions and have never been disappointed in the food. I love their pulled pork and I have tried their ribs and brisket
column2: which were delicious! I usually get the macaroni & cheese and that is yummy too. I have yet to try their peach cobbler since I always leave here feeling stuffed. If you're in the area I would definitely recommend trying this place.
